mapper.insert: insert into members(id, pw, name, email, gender, tel, img) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{tel}, #{img})
mapper.select: select * from members where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
mapper.insert: insert into followers(mid, ino, follow_date) values (#{mid}, #{ino}, NOW())
mapper.select: select mid from followers where ino = #{ino};
